text: If you're unfamiliar with it, Jada Pinkett Smith's Red Table Talk is one of the realest talk shows streaming today. As the host, and with the help of her 17 - year - old daughter, Willow, and her mother, Adrienne Banfield - Jones, Pinkett Smith comfortably covers juicy topics like sex, love, and family while also interviewing celebrities. And now that the trailer for the second season has dropped, we're anxiously waiting for it to return to Facebook Watch on October 22. So how successful was the debut? The hit show is a finalist for the 2018 People's Choice Awards Daytime Talk Show category, and the new season promises major interviews with celebrities like Ellen Pompeo, Leah Remini, and the lead host's husband, Will Smith.
